text: Clive Reid (20 April 1922 – 7 March 1972) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1922 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Coburg Football Club players
title: Clive Reid
